page.title: 12OUTDOOR GAMES ON RAASAY
page.content: NEARLY EVERY BOY ON RAASAY PLAYS FOOTBALL.THERE ARE SOME SWINGS DOWN IN THE PARK.SOMETIMES WE PLAY SCEETCHI ON THE ROAD.SCEETCHI IS A GAME THAT YOU PLAY WITH A SLATE,YOU THROW THE SLATE AT A NUMBER ON THE SCEETCHI THEN YOU HOP TO IT AND PICK IT UP THEN HOP BACK.IF YOU HOP ON A LINE YOU ARE OUT. SOMETIMES I PLAY TENNIS AGAINST A WALL.THERE ARE LOTS OF PLACES TO HIDE ON RAASAY SO I SOMETIMES PLAY HIDE AND SEEK WITH SOME OTHER PEOPLE.I SOMETIMES HAVE SWORD FIGHTS BUT I DO NOT HAVE ANY SWORDS,SO I USE STICKS.IF YOU HAVE A DARRO OR A FISHING ROD YOU CAN GO FISHING AT THE PIER OR AT THE HOME LOCH,OR IF YOU HAVE A BOAT YOU CAN FISH OUT IN THE SEA.
